meanings.definition: Encephalomyocarditises: inflammation of the brain and heart.
meanings.sent1: The encephalomyocarditises caused great concern among the doctors.
meanings.sent2: The rare condition of encephalomyocarditises requires specialized treatment.
meanings.sent3: The encephalomyocarditises decided to throw a party in the brain and heart.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him felt like encephalomyocarditises, spreading warmth and intensity.
meanings.sent5: The encephalomyocarditises danced wildly, affecting both the brain and heart.
